TextView.android:text:
The max blueprint image size for this application 4096x4096. 

You can import location data from a file named “dataJoe.txt” to the application’s memory by choosing “import file” from the application's menu. Or you can export location data that is currently in the memory to a file named “dataJoe.txt” by choosing “export file” from the application's menu. Note that this will overwrite existing data in “dataJoe.txt”. 

In the calibration phase, choose a starting point “S” and an ending point “E”. After that, press “start recording” and walk with a steady speed from point “S” to point “E”. After reaching point “E” press “stop recording“. You can then view the recordings, save or dismiss them.
